data.text: Best I've found yet. Since losing the original remote to puppy teeth, I've bought a number of "universal" remotes, most of which didn't work very well and tended to eat batteries. Also tried several "remote control" apps, with same lack of success. All advertised functions actually work, easy to use, quick to set up and, best of all, IT'S FREE !!!

Was pleasantly surprised at how many brands and models of TV this works with. I got an old TV secondhand and it didn't come with a remote, now I don't need to buy a replacement right away. Took just a minute to set up and works great. Only issue is that I wish it had more than the bare minimum buttons. (I was really hoping I could use this app to change the display picture size.)
data.replyText: Hi, thanks for using our APP. We're always working to add more useful functions. Currently, due to communication limitations between the remote APP and TV, it's not feasible to directly access TV system settings for changing picture size. Thanks for your understanding. ❤️ Any other questions, feel free to tell us at tvremoteappservice@gmail.com. 😊

data.text: Remote works but ads are annoying. I understand that ads make it possible to get free apps; however, there are times when ads can make an app unusable. Using a remote requires frequent button pushing. It's annoying when a clickable ad pops up just as you are pressing a remote button, and you accidentally open the ad. Seems kinda sneaky in my opinion. I might just write my own app.

Too many ads that bug up using the app. I can't stomach waiting for the app to connect. It did connect but didn't do more than messing with the volume. The ads are always fighting against your ability to learn the app because of the constant need of getting you to click an ad. I'm out!

Connected to my television without any problems, but it could only control the volume. The ads were also very annoying. So I spent $24 to get rid of ads and unlock all the features. It said that it would let me use the touch screen and all of the other buttons. The ads stopped, but I can still only control the volume. I even restarted my phone. Feels like a scam. Update: Apparently it doesn't work with my Brand TV. It should say that somewhere. Still one star.
data.replyText: Hello Rashida, we apologize for the inconvenience. We have received your email and have provided you with detailed answers and solutions via email. Please check it promptly. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us again. Sincerely. 🌹

data.text: This app actually works, it has ALL or MOST tv brands, even cable. I downloaded it and it's honestly better than most apps, it has ads every once in a while but there only picture ads, The app is good yes, but I gave it 4 stars because it is a bit slow during times. But other than that if you lost your remote I recommend. Have a great day or night! 💗🥰
data.replyText: Hello, thank you for your sincere sharing and support of our app! Regarding the issue you mentioned about the app running slowly, we would like to know in more detail which feature or operation you are referring to. You can send us relevant screenshots via Settings -> Feedback. This will help us offer a more precise solution. Thanks in advance. 🥰

data.text: God no. Started the app, got an ad before anything else. Pushed a button to confirm my language, got another ad. Pushed the next button to select my brand, you got it, another ad. This is disgusting. In response to the developers response, I couldn't even get the thing set up and connected without having ad after ad shoved down my throat. The supposed purpose of the app is far overwhelmed by the rapid fire ads with each touch of the screen.
data.replyText: Hi Gary, sorry for the inconvenience. To maintain the free availability of the app, please understand that we need to show ads. Meanwhile, we offer the ad-free premium version, and you can enjoy a 3-day free trial. During the trial period, you can experience all features to determine if the app meets your needs. Feel free to give it a try! 😊

data.text: I searched through a lot of different apps to simply turn the volume up on our TV but they either wanted a monthly subscription any payment to work or didn't work at all. This app doesn't ask for any subscription and functions the exact same as the actual remote that came with the TV. Thank you!! Highly recommend.

I have been struggling with finding my remote lately and my previous remote app glitched out, while trying to find it again I found this one. Don't waste your time. I don't pay to remove ads, that's useless, but the audacity this app has to say changing your volume is PREMIUM. I could click on mute and the arrows and the ok button and all of that. But the moment I wanted to adjust the volume SIGN UP FOR PREMIUM! Useless.
data.replyText: Hello, thank you for contacting us. The buttons such as volume, mute, power on/off, "OK", etc. in the app are free to use. To help our technical team better identify your problem, please tell us your TV brand and model type. We will try our best to figure it out for you. You can also send relevant screenshots to tvremoteappservice@gmail.com. 🌹

data.text: I don't know what to think about this app. I paid the $9.99 for the ad free version and I'll be damned if it doesn't still force me to watch an ad on every 3rd time you hit the button! Which is a real rip when turning off the screen takes 5 pushes of the button to accomplish! I have in and ordered an actual remote control for $6.99 from Amazon.
data.replyText: Hello, generally, after subscribing to our app, you will enjoy the "100% ad-free" feature. You can confirm whether your purchase was successful by checking the Google Play Store or finding a confirmation email from Google in your mailbox. For further help, please send us your order screenshot via tvremoteappservice@gmail.com. We are here to help.🌹

data.text: I downloaded this and Movie pro. It is a bit tricky to remember which wifi is running so they must match. My settings are on the lower version (2.5 vs 5g) Because the loaner phone I have doesn't support 5g I have no choice. They must match. As long as you're careful, you should have no problems. Lost your Roku remote, download this and control away.
data.replyText: Hello, thank you for your sincere sharing and support for our app. If you like it, could you please give us a 5-star rating? It'll inspire us to do better. Thank you! ❤️ If you have any questions while using the app, please feel free to contact us at tvremoteappservice@gmail.com. We will be at your service. Have a nice day. 😊

data.text: There was so many ads I couldn't get to the setup screen for my TV. I understand that's how it makes money but I can't even set up the app. Please consider calming down the ads until at least it's set up. If you have a TV that runs Google, not Amazon, not Roku. And you have an Android phone. You have a TV remote app built right in FYI.
data.replyText: Hi, we apologize for any inconvenience caused by ads. To offer you free remote control services, we depend on ad revenue to support our app's operation and enhancements. We're working to improve your experience by minimizing ad frequency and disruption. Besides, we also offer the ad-free feature. Thanks for your understanding. Best regards. ❤️

data.text: The ads on this app are atrocious. At first I was able to tolerate them, but now they appear every second. The app itself isn't too bad. It has a wide range of TVs. Sometimes it takes a while for it to work, but you'll be able to manage. Tone down the ads for real though. Edit: Changing rating because the app has caused more problems for me, I might just end up deleting it. This app has more ads than one of those trashy mobile games, it's really bad.
data.replyText: Hi there, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We know that ads can be a nuisance, but they allow us to continue offering our app for free. We will work to optimize the ad placement and frequency to make sure they are not overly disruptive to the user experience. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve our app.

data.text: Ads too strong Edit: I appreciate the response, to further explain what I mean is that ads are everywhere all the time. There's no escaping them but it's the part where they interrupt use and cover 50%+ of the screen at the same time while a skip is offered near instantly it still makes it super easy to accidentally click an add other than that. This app did what I wanted and surpassed my expectations and I don't think I'll switch to another remote app anytime soon. Thank you
data.replyText: Hi there, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We know that ads can be a nuisance, but they allow us to continue offering our app for free. We will work to optimize the ad placement and frequency to make sure they are not overly disruptive to the user experience. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve our app.

data.text: The remote app would be great except for two small problems 1) The ads cover up most of the app display so you can't use it properly. Your forced to exit out of the app or force close the app just to see the app control screen. 2) When you can actually use the app as a remote control the "constant vibration" on every touch and selection of the app controls is really annoying. I like my remotes to be silent... there's no way to Turn Off the haptic feedback vibrations.

It works! That's about the most glowing review you could give an app like this. Took less than 30seconds to sync up. Only downside is, the ads that pop up look like part of the app. Update: non skip-able ads on a remote control app is unbearable. Especially when a commercial comes on tv and its 27 decibels louder than the show you were watching but you have to sit through a 30second ad( sometimes 2) before it lets you actually use the remote. Sorry, I had to lower my rating and uninstal.
data.replyText: Hi Marissa, thank you for your feedback regarding the ads in our app. We know that ads can be a nuisance, but they allow us to continue offering our app for free. We will try to find ways to display ads without disturbing you in the future. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve our app. 🌹

data.text: I cannot believe this app works as well as it does. Setup was like, literally just a couple buttons. Sure it isn't ad-free if you aren't paying, but by the beard of Zeus do I not care. I lost my remote for my TV, didn't have a way to do anything on my tv, and wanted to play my switch.. Couldn't change the input or volume, so I was stuck with the world's loudest static, and uh.. I got desperate, haha. This app saved my sanity amd my television experience. Oh, and they support like every TV ever.♡

Have never uninstalled an app so fast. Couldn't even see if it worked with my tv because of the bottom placed ad, that has no close button, was in the way of the language selection screen. How does this have so many positive reviews? I closed the app to try and complete the setup and it was a different ad but still no close button. Click on the annoying ad go back to the app, different ad and still no close button. I get free apps have ads, but this was equivalent to a computer virus.
data.replyText: Hi, sorry for your bad experience. You can select the language by swiping up or down on the area above the ad. As our APP is free, please understand that we need to display ads to keep our development team working sustainably. We'll try to find ways to display ads without disturbing you. Any issues, please tell us at tvremoteappservice@gmail.com.🌹

data.text: I love this app. So whenever I lose the control, I have a remote on my phone. I lose the remote a lot so this is perfect. I don't know if it's just my phone but when I open the app, it sometimes freezes and really bugs me out. The ads don't really bother me that much. But if you can fix the problem. Then this app would be 5 stars 🤩🤩🤩. 10 stars if that was possible.
data.replyText: Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. Please ensure your network is smooth and try again. If it still fails, you can try to disconnect the network connection of your phone before opening the app, then reconnect the network after entering the app. If your problem is not solved, please describe your problem in detail via tvremoteappservice@gmail.com. 😊

data.text: Wow, this app sucks. For one, the ads are awful, anything with this many ads is a scam. They're just trying to juice as much as they can. Secondly, the only thing I can control on my TV is the volume. Immediately deleted. If you're going to do your customers with that many ads the least you can do is either create a working product or make sure we aren't using it wrong with a tutorial.
data.replyText: Hi, sorry for the bad experience. Could you please tell us your TV make and model? We're sorry that our APP currently may not be fully compatible with specific TV brands or models. We'll strive to expand support to cover more brands of devices. Besides, as our app is free, please understand that we need to run ads to earn a living. Kind regards. 🌹

data.text: Easy to use. I would give it 5 stars but I got caught up in an 'ad loop' where for 24 hours every time I pushed a button I got a video ad. I rebooted my tablet and my TV with no luck. I don't mind the ads for free products but until it resumed to normal it rendered the device unusable. Also it only will work when I am connected to our 5G wifi and if that signal gets weak our system defaults to regular wifi and the app doesn't work (it to me a while to figure it out) highly recommended!
data.replyText: Hello Daniel, thanks for your recognition of our app. We would be grateful if you could leave us a 5-star rating. Your feedback and support are invaluable to us and will motivate us to keep making our app even better. 🌹

data.text: The remote works great. If you don't have an iPhone and your remote is dead it's definitely worth it. You do need to turn the TV on before connecting and my TV controller was dead so I had to turn it on from the bottom of my TV. It's a great app for anyone that needs an online remote app. It's free and works perfect. I would definitely recommend.

Good in a pinch. WAAAY too many ads. And inconveniently placed too when setting up. I probably pressed 5 different ads trying to get it set up because they make it look like it's part of the app. Will probably uninstall once I leave my brother's today. Overall, good for a few hours when you can't find the remote. Probably won't install again.
data.replyText: Hi Hannah, thank you for your feedback. We know that ads can be a nuisance, but they allow us to continue offering our app for free. We will work to optimize the ad placement and frequency to make sure they are not overly disruptive to the user experience. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve our app. 🌹

data.text: Only had it for about 5 minutes. Tried connecting it to my TV but had so many adds pop up that when I would click to turn on my TV, I ended up clicking on an add that popped up. I understand adds are important for free apps but come on, that's ridiculous. I'll just get my lazy butt up off the couch to turn the TV on!
data.replyText: Hi Meg, we're sorry to hear that you've had a negative experience with the ads in our app. We rely on ads to keep our app free and sustainable, but we also recognize that it's important to keep the user experience in mind. We will do our best to ensure that the ads are not too intrusive and make the necessary adjustments based on your feedback.

data.text: Way too many ads. I am willing to deal with some ads as I know the app has to generate income. However, these ads are both intrusive and seem predatory in that they request imput without clearly saying they are an ad and they imply that they are part of the app setup. This is predatory. Also they are intrusive and come up every few remote clicks. Other than that, the app appears to work as indicated, but unusable due to ads.
data.replyText: Hi there, we're sorry to hear that you've had a negative experience with the ads in our app. We rely on ads to keep our app free and sustainable, but we also recognize that it's important to keep the user experience in mind. We will do our best to ensure that the ads are not too intrusive and make the necessary adjustments based on your feedback.

data.text: When they say there are ads, this is what they mean: The app will start with a full screen ad. It won't be labeled as an ad. It will look like it's part of the app setup process. If you click it to set up the remote, it takes you to a webpage that will prompt you to enter a credit card number. This type of unlabeled, scammy ad is repeated after every single step. I don't feel comfortable allowing this app to have access to my network.

It's one of the only apps that actually work for my TV, sure there are a few ads but u can skip them easily. It actually works and u can connect it easy, I've never been so sure for THESE stars. edit: well I've used the app, and i can only use channels, i can't use streaming services like Tubi, Netflix, Disney etc. And the OK button doesn't work, that's the reason I CAN'T use streaming services, 3 stars until the app picks up.
data.replyText: Hi there, we've forwarded your feedback to our development team. They'll take it into serious consideration for future optimization. You may restart our app and check if the OK button works. If the problem persists, please edit your comment to know your TV model type. As the app is free, please understand we need to display ads to keep it that way.

data.text: Works but the delay with the adds sucks, leave the app open on your phone and turn on the screen it takes a minute. Hit a button and the delay will put you online looking at garbage. If they want their app to work, they'll either stop with the adds or make it work correctly with the adds rather than a constant delay that makes you open the browser.

I downloaded this because the tv remote in my house is missing. Every two seconds an ad pops up, the remote doesn't even click what I want it to, I cant search anything up on the TV because the remote will only click on one letter, I cant pick videos I want to watch because it clicks a different video that I haven't even scrolled passed or come across. And let's not forget to mention the fact I cant even select videos on the remote, I have to go to the touch remote side. Its annoying.

Way too many ads!! I understand ads help support the program but it's like every click/action generates an ad. That's frustrating. Also, app doesn't always work. Hit or miss. It scrolls thru the apps on my TV, but when I click ok to open the app, does nothing. Also a long delays from the time to click a button to response time.
data.replyText: Hi Kate, we're sorry for your bad experience. To help our technical team better identify your problem, please edit your comment here to let us know your TV brand and model type. Meanwhile, as our app is totally free, we need to display ads to keep our team working sustainably, but we'll try to make necessary adjustments to make them less intrusive.

data.text: I downloaded this app before and It was horrible. Maybe thats just because my old phone was an older phone. I decided to give it another shot and it worked amazing. I had zero troubles when trying to get it to connect to my TV. There are quite a bit of adds but you can easily skip through them. 10/10 app and I totally recommend it:)

Connected to all 3 of my tvs (two tcls and a roku) pretty quickly, but nothing was even usable except the volume keys, which worked fine. I'd have given 2 stars for the quickness of loading and setting up but the unbearable amount of ads took it down to one. One of the ads I couldn't even click out of, just took me to the download page online regardless of where I tapped.
data.replyText: Hi Matt, we are sorry to know that your experience on the app was not satisfactory. Please share your problem with us at tvremoteappservice@gmail.com and we will look into it at the earliest. Besides, as our app is completely free, please understand that we need to run ads to keep our team working sustainably. Kind regards. 🌹

data.text: This is a very good APP. The TV that I have only works with a remote and I have been waiting for this cheap piece of plastic to break and leave me with no choice but to buy another TV. But this APP has relieved me of any concerns. It does everything that the remote does and it does it every time. Even better. I am often disappointed with a lot of apps and seldom an I completely satisfied however, this time they did a really good job 😊😊😊

Your Play Store screenshots show a pop-up alphanumeric keyboard. That keyboard is nowhere to be found in the app. A full page advert covers the screen entirely after every mode change. I would pay to not get adverts, so my 90 year old father could use this. The TV Brands list takes up to a minute to load. The app takes a minute to find the tv each time I open it, and it times out. The WiFi box sits right next to the tv. This app is worse than using a remote. Big fail. Please fix it.
data.replyText: Hi, the function keys on remote control panels vary among different TV brands, so some brands may not support keyboard functions. Our app's connection relies on the TV service, which sometimes may be unstable, causing a long search time. Sorry, we can't control it either. Besides, we run ads to earn a living, but we plan to add an ad-free feature.

data.text: Linked to tv fairly fast, remote set up is user friendly..problem with this app is TO MANY ADS!!!!! you can't even use the remote because everytime you touch a function a damn ad pops up and you either have to wait for it to finish or search for the X to get rid of it !!! This remote ad is basically useless, do yourself a favor and download a different app!!!
data.replyText: Hi M 1, thank you for your feedback regarding the ads in our app. We understand that they can be bothersome, and we are constantly working to improve the user experience while also keeping the app free for all users. We appreciate your understanding and patience as we strive to find the right balance between ads and user experience. 🌹

data.text: The ads are too obtrusive, they pop up at the wrong timesl- uninstalled the same day. Update: I know ads are needed to keep apps free, but, when the ads interfere with the use of the app having the app is pointless. The app is a good remote control, it setup easy and was usable right away, four ⭐ for the working part of the app.
data.replyText: Hi Scott, we're sorry to hear that you've had a negative experience with the ads in our app. We rely on ads to keep our app free and sustainable, but we also recognize that it's important to keep the user experience in mind. We will do our best to ensure that the ads are not too intrusive and make the necessary adjustments based on your feedback.

data.text: Awesome experience. The only downside is the ads and the inability to customize the buttons. I had to go deep into the settingh to find the source change button which is labelled "srcc". Please add the button to the main remote. Thanks.

Ridiculous......supposed to support IR TV's but have to have WiFi connected to tv. Not worth wasting your time unless it's smart tv with internet. Note: my phone DOES have IR yet the app still forces you through WiFi connection to tv.....again, ridiculous 🙄 😒 Note I have 2 phones, s23+ which does not have IR and a galaxy s6edge which does. Funny that huh? Next excuse???
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry for the inconvenience and hope to resolve the issue for you as soon as possible. Could you provide more details and tell us your TV brand and model type? Are you unable to pair with your TV when testing the Remote in the IR mode? If it's convenient, you can send us relevant screenshots via Feedback in the app. Thanks in advance! ❤️

data.text: Limited set ov buttons, and yet several are disabled or not working. Can't even switch the TV off. Cannot select IR mode. Ads are way too intrusive. My TV: Philips 49PUS6482/12 My smartphone does have IR functionality (Samsung Galaxy S10) Thanks for the quick response.
data.replyText: Hi, thanks for using our app. To help us better identify your problem, please tell us your TV brand and model type. We will try our best to figure it out for you. Besides, to use the IR remote, your phone needs to have a built-in infrared function. If it doesn't, we're sorry, but the IR mode won't work. Thanks for your understanding. Sincerely. 🌹

data.text: I'm sure it works fine, but I was extremely confused to learn that modern phones are not all equipped with an IR emitter by default. The tech is mostly extinct, sure, but I still use IR devices all the time and emitters are cheaper than water. I don't get it tbh.🤷‍♀️
data.replyText: Hi, we fully understand your feelings. Whether modern phones are equipped with infrared emitters is determined by the phone manufacturer, and we cannot control it. Besides, we'll strive to provide the best service. If you want, could you please give us a five-star rating? It would be a recognition and support for our team's hard work. Thank you. 🌹

data.text: I downloaded this app because my remote for my tv which is less than a year old took a dump on me and stopped working. This app worked great but now I have NO sound and NO picture and NO instructions how to get it back. To add to the frustration, the ads are obnoxious.
data.replyText: Hi, we take your issue very seriously and hope to help you resolve it. To help our developers locate the issue better, could you tell us your TV brand and model type via "Settings" -> "Feedback" in the app and send the attached log? Some related videos may also be helpful. Thank you in advance for your understanding and cooperation. Best wishes. ❤️

data.text: Our remote control broke and we wanted to try a cell phone controlled application before ordering another. So glad we did because it saved us from having to wait for delivery as well as the expense. This remote application works great (like not having to search for a physical remote).

A decent app,but there are 2 problems: 1.It has TONS of ads. 2.It sadly, does not work for my tv. Even if it's the same network, same tv brand, and same tv name, it still doesn't work. But it's still decent, it's just not useful.

It's cool I guess because you get to have multiple TV remote things in it and it has a lot a unknown vrands of tvs. The bad thing about it is the ads and the subscription it keeps making you click on but yeah really good in general

Tiktok ads anyone? Install the app? Have a tiktok ad. Start the app? Another Tiktok ad. Connect to the TV? Another Tiktok ad. Then, before using the app, another Tiktok ad. Changed the channel. Yay! It works! ...looked at something else on the phone. Switched back to the app. Guess what. Yup. Another Tiktok ad. TV was disconnected, so reconnected. Another Tiktok ad. It works well enough. Would pay cash for the app, but no way in hell Imma pay in installments of tiktok ads. Uninstalling.
data.replyText: Hi, we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused by the ads. To offer you free remote control services, we depend on ad revenue to support our app's operation and enhancement. However, the content of the advertisement is controlled by the advertiser. Thanks for your understanding. Meanwhile, we also offer the ad-free feature. Best regards.❤️

data.text: Hands down the first app I've found for a Samsung remote that u don't need the actual remote to link it to. It gave the option to link it I closed the app gave it one more chance then it allowed me to save my tv and connected it ! 🙌

This is a fake app. Wants you to pay a monthly or annual subscription. Just to remove ads. Speaking of ads. That all this app is. Just an ads app. Playing full screen ads that some last for 2 minutes and got to watch 2 in a row. Can't skip it either. No wonder it tells you to switch off your VPN
data.replyText: Hi, our APP can be used for free, such as volume, power on/off, OK buttons, etc. In the Premium version, you can unlock no ads, screen mirroring, touchpad, etc. You can choose based on your needs. To offer free service, please understand that we need to show ads to earn a living. Switching off the VPN is to ensure a stable connection with the TV.❤️

data.text: The ads 😅😅 Ridiculous!!! You can't even skip them. You have to go through 2 ads (each of them lasts for like 2 minutes) to open the actual app. So each time you want to watch TV, you have to enjoy 4 minutes of high quality ads first. And a new ad pops up each time you press a button. Unfortunately, the amount of ads makes this app UNUSABLE. Extremely disappointing...
data.replyText: Hi, we apologize for any inconvenience caused by ads. To offer you free remote control services, we depend on ad revenue to support our app's operation and enhancements. We're working to improve your experience by minimizing ad frequency and disruption. Besides, we also offer the ad-free feature. Thanks for your understanding. Best regards. ❤️

data.text: It's just like a normal remote except you can switch through any channel not just four you can have it original like the button pressed or you can swipe with your finger it's a little different but not in a bad way and it's got every type of TV

Adequate, when it works...you can't turn a tv on from the app. It looses contact with TV's on a regular basis. Adds have no problem activating wether the app is working or not. Unfortunately, it's about what can be expected from a free app.
data.replyText: Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. When the TV is off, the Wi-Fi connection is lost, so the app cannot connect to control it. Thanks for your understanding. Regarding the disconnection issue you mentioned, could you please provide detailed descriptions? You can contact us via "Settings -> Feedback" with the attached log. We will help you solve it. 🌹

data.text: This is a joke!! It doesn't do everything your regular TV remote does and has a lot of annoying ads popping up with everything you try to do!! This is certainly one app that WON'T be cluttering up my phones screen!!
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry for your bad experience. You can describe your problem in detail and send your TV brand & model type via tvremoteappservice@gmail.com. We will provide you with targeted help. 😊 Besides, as our app is free, please understand that we need to run ads to earn a living. Kind regards. ❤️

data.text: Good stuff, a lot of ads but hey, beggars can't be chosers. Only problem is if you have...say lost the remote this app cannot switch it on. So do it manually, and everything's fine.
Amazing app! I couldn't find my TV remote at 1:30 in the morning to turn the TV off. I finally downloaded this app and was back to sleeping in no time.
Riddled with ads. Extremely hard to navigate because there are pop-ups and ads at every single loading screen. Doesn't even work if TV isn't previously set up and on wifi
Couldn't get my TV to turn on without the remote because the TV has no buttons and my Roku app wasn't connecting. Downloaded this app and had my TV on in 60 seconds
Gives you add every minute always interrupts you while you're trying to put something on with an ad and it makes my phone really slow yes it works but I wouldn't recommend it
data.replyText: Hi, we apologize for any inconvenience caused by ads. To offer you free remote control services, we depend on ad revenue to support our app's operation and enhancements. We're working to improve your experience by minimizing ad frequency and disruption. Besides, we also offer the ad-free feature. Thanks for your understanding. Best regards. ❤️

data.text: This is one of the best apps as long as there is not that many ads but the sad thing is you can't cast whatever's on your phone unless you buy the premium or whatever that is. But otherwise the app is really good 😊
It works without too much hasle! Many ads but in short countdown, for me personally no problem. I used this in hospital, helps a lot to enjoy my time to recover, thank you 🤍

Sadly this app is poorly underrated and people need to under stand it doesn't work for their TV brand, mine worked perfectly and unlike the other app I was using, that after pressing the power button too many times, it would need me to buy something for all features, this one isn't that money hungry, I appreciate their work.
Absolutely amazing I love Roku all the way around and have recommended it to everyone I know I even converted a few from Paying that high cost of cable. Tv
It works, but just barely. There's an ad almost every time you hit a button, and when I start up the app it gives me a dangerous phishing scam. Sadly, i do not reccomend.

data.text: I love how much options they give to personalize your remote name and language. It is also do helpful when you have lost you remote.

I tried to connect to my TV, and it didn't work, and the ads are very annoying and terrible. I feel like the whole app is a scam

I'm not sure if other apps are better but this one without a doubt is a simple cash grab app with no design or functionality that is meant to stream revenue via adds without providing it's promised service. Waste of time.

I had an older tv whose remote was lost and the control buttons behind it were non functional, i tried many apps but this one could actually control it.

it works for what its intended purpose is, however, I downloaded the app remote to increase button response speed due to a sub-par real remote at home, and this app remote is even slower than that. plus the constant ads, and they clearly do it in a deceptive way to try and confuse you into clicking them.

Waste of time. I installed this all expecting to joke around with my parents and say "oh what's going on with Tue TV haha" but no I install this and find out you have to PAY FOR IT???? The least you could of done is warned us You have to PAY. There's only a 3 Day trial. You get The remote, screen casting,You're actually able to turn the volume up surprisingly. data.text: So I downloaded this app. Because I lost my remote. And I wanted to raise the volume but I don't have my remote. So when I downloaded this app, it asks me to press OK and allow the transition between my phone and the TV to be able to connect. How do I do that and I need a remote. This is the point of the app. U goofballs.
data.replyText: Hi, thanks for your feedback. Kindly note that our remote control requires permission from the TV to establish a connection. You can try to access permission via some physical buttons on the TV, usually on the front, top, or sides of the TV. You can try pressing the relevant buttons for basic controls. Thank you for your understanding. ❤️
